Class MessageOfTheDay

  • java.lang.Object
    • MessageOfTheDay

  • public class MessageOfTheDay
extends java.lang.Object
    Retrieves the message of the day from the API by solving the puzzles given in the API
    Creation Date: 25/11/19.
    Last Modification Date: 26/11/19.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Nihal Goindi (976005)

      • getRequest

        public static java.lang.String getRequest(java.lang.String url)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Issues a HTTP get request to URL and reads the text on the web page.
        Parameters:
        url - - the webpage that we want to access.
        Returns:
        text, i.e. the message to decode.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - If getRequest can't establish a connection.

      • solvePuzzle

        private static java.lang.String solvePuzzle(java.lang.String puzzle)
        Algorithm used to decode the text retrieved from the API.
        Parameters:
        puzzle - String - the unsolved key that will be solved to find the message.
        Returns:
        solution, the decoded string of characters. from the API which can be used to access the message.

      • getDecodedText

        public static java.lang.String getDecodedText()
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        This uses both methods above to retrieve the decoded message from the API.
        Returns:
        the decoded message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - If getRequest can't establish a connection.
